price: Da ma'abũta ƙunci *da mutãnen Tubba'u,** kõwanensu ya ƙaryata Manzanni, sai ƙyacẽwaTa ta tabbata.
arabic: وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡأَيۡكَةِ وَقَوۡمُ تُبَّعٖۚ كُلّٞ كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ
footnotes: * Ma'abũta ƙunci, mutãnen shu'aibu ne na farko. Bãyan an halaka su, sa'an nan ya tafi Madayana. ** Tubba'u, sarkin Himyar ne,a Yemen, yã musulunta amma mutãnensa suka ƙi bin sa ga addini, aka halaka su, shi kuma ya tsĩra. Shĩ ne sarki wanda ya sãɓãwa ƙã'ida; ya musulunta amma mabiyansa ba su musulunta ba.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-aṣḥābu al-aykati waqawmu tubbaʿin kullun kadhaba al-rusula faḥaqqa waʿīdi
